data.Title: Google Ends Continuous Scroll in Search Results
data.Description: Google is dropping continuous scroll in search results, starting with desktop, with mobile to follow soon.  Continuous scroll launched in Google mobile search in October 2021 and on desktop in December 2022.

data.Title: Google Says Using Branded Keywords in Content Doesn't Hurt Rankings
data.Description: Google's SearchLiaison, Danny Sullivan, responded to new SEO advice that you should not include brand names in review content. Sullivan disagreed, saying, "you shouldn't be afraid to mention the brand name of something you are reviewing."

data.Title: Google Search to Show More AI Overviews for Health Queries
data.Description: Google Search is showing more AI Overviews for health queries since pulling them back a few weeks ago.

data.Title: Google Testing AI Overviews With Link Cards at the Top
data.Description: Google confirmed it is testing placing the link cards for the AI Overviews at the top - hope this rolls out but Google confirmed this is just a test...

data.Title: Google Adds Guidance for How to Markup Multiple Items on a Category Page Using Structured Data Carousel (Beta)
data.Description: Google has added a new bullet point in the structured data carousels (beta) help documentation around how to mark up categories with many items with that structured data.  This is based on examples pages such as paginated content or infinite scroll.

data.Title: Google Search Ranking Systems Aren't Perfect
data.Description: Google's SearchLiaison acknowledged imperfections in their ranking systems and shared steps they are taking to improve search results.  Google is working on improving search rankings on the system level, so it can scale, not on an individual site level

data.Title: Google Updates Sitemap Documentation
data.Description: Google updated its sitemap document to add "The lastmod value should reflect the date and time of the last significant update to the page"

data.Title: Google Chrome for Mobile Adds New Search Features
data.Description: Google Chrome for mobile adds new search features including local Chrome Actions, new search shortcuts, trending in search suggestions and more

data.Title: Google Search Tests Sliding the Page to the Right on Entering a New Query
data.Description: Google Search tests sliding the page to the right on entering a new query

data.Title: Google is Updating its Business Profile Terms of Service
data.Description: Google is updating its Business Profile terms of service

data.Title: Google Ads Updates Search Ads Query Matching and Brand Controls
data.Description: Google Ads updates to its Search ads query matching and brand controls that made advertisers happy. Includes better reporting for misspellings, negative keywords now block misspellings, and changes to brand inclusions and brand exclusions

data.Title: New Google Ads Report for Target ROAS Insights
data.Description: ICYMI: New Google Ads report for target ROAS insights for Performance Max and Standard Shopping campaigns

data.Title: Google Local Service Ads to Automate Lead Credits
data.Description: Google Local Service Ads will automate lead credits.

data.Title: Perion Network Announces Layoffs
data.Description: Perion Network announced to lay off its 6% of the workforce due to cost-cutting measures. The Perion Network layoffs. announced due to Microsoft's pricing policy change, will affect around 35 employees.
